column5: Does anyone know if this camp is still in opertation? I have tried several times to contact and not been able to bring up their website. thanks

They went out of business. So has Edmund lake lodge in Manitoba. More will come due to the high costs of fuel, terrible exchange rate, and slow American economy. You might want to think about the complaining that some of you do on this site with regards to lodge owners raising their prices to high. This industry is is hurting big time!! Trust me i am in the know. You will see more lodges going out of business. Troubling times for the lodge owners.
